title: Cant click play.
body:
It says "Scanning files" and around 2800 files scanned the client pops up a message that "patching has failed and you need to restart the client and try again Error 004 " 

I restarted my client and it didnt work. Help?

replies.body: Those 004 errors are a pretty good sign that your pc doesn't have the right permissions set up in order to let League scan the game files for that patch. Do me a favor and run through the steps in this [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be able to get patched up!
Ok. Submit a support ticket letting them know what steps you've taken and that the issue still persists. I hope that helps!

Hello Supportguy,

Here is a FAQ from Riot addressing the 004 error here --> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/4YAFyi4P-is-your-updated-client-not-working-youve-come-to-the-right-place

Nice name by the way.
